stories.title: Sasuke's Cooking Disaster!
stories.intro: Sasuke is forced to join a cooking contest against Sanji, Soma, and Naruto... with explosive results.

stories.title: The Villain Rehab Program
stories.intro: Bakugo, Dabi, and Hisoka are sentenced to live in a shared dorm and attend therapy together.

stories.title: Dating Levi is Hard Mode
stories.intro: You're dating Levi Ackerman... but Erwin and Hange won't stop interfering.

stories.title: Power Swap: Tanjiro Becomes a Titan
stories.intro: A dimensional glitch swaps Tanjiro into the world of Titans—and gives him transformation powers.

stories.title: Roommates With Gojo Satoru
stories.intro: Living with Gojo seemed cool—until he started inviting cursed spirits to the living room.

stories.title: Death Note in the Love Hotel
stories.intro: You find a Death Note in the most unexpected place: the drawer of a seedy love hotel.

stories.title: The Maid Cafe Training Arc
stories.intro: Gon, Luffy, and Deku must work undercover at a maid café for a secret mission.

stories.title: Yuji Itadori's Forbidden Wish
stories.intro: Yuji makes a wish to a cursed object—one that promises to make Megumi fall in love with him.

stories.title: Sakura Haruno vs. Internet Hate
stories.intro: Sakura discovers the anime fandom and isn't happy about what she reads.

stories.title: Katsuki Bakugo's Babysitting Nightmare
stories.intro: Bakugo is forced to babysit Eri, Anya, and Nezuko for a weekend. He is not okay.

stories.title: The Idol Auditions of Hell
stories.intro: Levi, Killua, and Sasuke are forced to compete in a school idol competition.

stories.title: Isekai'd Into My Own Fanfic
stories.intro: You wake up in your cringy old anime fanfic—and your OC boyfriend is real.

stories.title: Aizawa’s Secret Cat Café
stories.intro: You discover your homeroom teacher runs a secret cat café on weekends.

stories.title: Nezuko’s First Sleepover
stories.intro: Tanjiro organizes a girls’ sleepover for Nezuko. Chaos, snacks, and pillow fights ensue.

stories.title: Gon and Killua's High School AU
stories.intro: Gon and Killua enroll in a normal high school... or so they think.

stories.title: Midoriya's Fake Dating Mission
stories.intro: To avoid suspicion on a mission, Deku must pretend to date Toga... and she's very into it.

stories.title: Light Yagami's TikTok Account
stories.intro: Light goes viral for motivational TikToks—until L starts leaving cryptic duets.

stories.title: Naruto's Therapy Arc
stories.intro: After years of trauma, Kakashi forces Naruto to attend therapy—with Gaara as his partner.

stories.title: Senku vs. Megumi: Bento War!
stories.intro: A simple lunch turns into a bento-box science vs. cuisine showdown.

stories.title: Eren's College Roommate is Gojo
stories.intro: They said college would be fun. Eren didn't expect infinity tricks and blindfolds.

stories.title: Tanjiro Joins the Host Club
stories.intro: Mistaken for a student, Tanjiro is recruited into the Ouran Host Club.

stories.title: Boys vs. Girls: Beach Episode Brawl
stories.intro: The class beach trip turns into a chaotic war over who builds the better sandcastle.

stories.title: Levi's Laundry Rage
stories.intro: When someone uses Levi's special detergent, heads will roll.

stories.title: Spy x Family Babysits Demon Kids
stories.intro: Loid is tasked with watching over Nezuko and Eri. What could go wrong?

stories.title: Sukuna's Dating Profile
stories.intro: A cursed object accidentally registers Sukuna on a dating app.

stories.title: Bakugo Becomes a Kindergarten Teacher
stories.intro: When UA runs a training program, Bakugo is stuck teaching toddlers.

stories.title: Inosuke's First Mall Experience
stories.intro: Inosuke tries to understand escalators and food courts. It doesn’t go well.

stories.title: Eri's Magical Girl Transformation
stories.intro: Eri finds a mysterious locket that gives her magical powers—but she's still five.

stories.title: Your New College Roommate is Luffy
stories.intro: All you wanted was a quiet dorm. Instead, you got Luffy... and his entire crew.

stories.title: Naruto's Speed Dating Disaster
stories.intro: Naruto tries speed dating to move on. Every date ends in disaster.

stories.title: Hinata Joins the Survey Corps
stories.intro: After a volleyball injury, Hinata wakes up in the world of Titans.

stories.title: Zenitsu Gets a Love Letter
stories.intro: Zenitsu receives a love letter... from an unexpected admirer.

stories.title: Killua’s Sleepover Survival Guide
stories.intro: Killua is invited to an all-boys anime sleepover. He’s not happy about it.

stories.title: Nezuko Starts a Vlog
stories.intro: Tanjiro helps Nezuko launch her own YouTube channel. Demon tips and chaos follow.

stories.title: Todoroki Gets a Dog
stories.intro: Shoto gets a support dog to cope with emotional repression. It turns out to be magical.

stories.title: Yuno’s Accidental Wish
stories.intro: Yuno wishes for a peaceful life—and ends up in a farming simulator.

stories.title: Muzan Joins a Book Club
stories.intro: To go unnoticed, Muzan disguises himself and joins a suburban book club.

stories.title: Erwin's Secret Kpop Obsession
stories.intro: The scouts discover their commander runs a secret K-pop stan account.

stories.title: L vs. Gojo: Poker Night
stories.intro: A poker night between Gojo and L turns into a 5D psychological war.

stories.title: Class 1-A Gets a New Drama Teacher
stories.intro: The new theater coach is none other than Hisoka. Expect chaos.

stories.title: Naruto's Ramen Rivalry
stories.intro: Ichiraku Ramen announces a cooking contest, and Naruto must face Sasuke's surprising culinary skills.

stories.title: Gohan Babysits Luffy?!
stories.intro: When Chi-Chi goes on vacation, Gohan is tasked with looking after a hyper Luffy.

stories.title: Kakashi’s Blind Date Mishap
stories.intro: Kakashi is set up on a blind date but things spiral out of control when Inosuke crashes the café.

stories.title: Gintoki Accidentally Joins UA High
stories.intro: Due to a paperwork mix-up, Gintoki finds himself enrolled as a hero student.

stories.title: Midoriya and the Cursed Sword
stories.intro: Izuku stumbles upon a cursed blade that links him to the world of Demon Slayer.

stories.title: Nezuko Enrolls in Pokemon Academy
stories.intro: To better control her instincts, Nezuko trains with Pokémon and bonds with Pikachu.

stories.title: Attack on Gym Class!
stories.intro: Levi and Mikasa are assigned as substitute P.E. teachers at UA, and their training is brutal.

stories.title: Tanjiro’s Tea Ceremony Trouble
stories.intro: A simple tea ceremony at the U.A. turns chaotic when Tanjiro accidentally uses demon-scented herbs.

stories.title: Jujutsu Idol Showdown
stories.intro: Gojo recruits his students for a charity idol performance, but they’re up against Team Naruto.

stories.title: Luffy’s Lost in the Soul Society
stories.intro: Luffy wakes up in Bleach’s Soul Society with no clue how he got there—and a hollow is now his pet.
